com.tofik.coolexoplayer.exoplayer

Class ExoPlayerViewHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tofik.coolexoplayer.exoplayer.CoolPlayerHelper
      • com.tofik.coolexoplayer.exoplayer.ExoPlayerViewHelper

  • public class ExoPlayerViewHelper
extends CoolPlayerHelper
    An implementation of CoolPlayerHelper where the actual Player is an ExoPlayer implementation. This is a bridge between ExoPlayer's callback and CoolPlayerHelper behaviors.
    Since:
    3.4.0

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.tofik.coolexoplayer.exoplayer.CoolPlayerHelper

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        protected void initialize(@NonNull
                          PlaybackInfo playbackInfo)
        Description copied from class: CoolPlayerHelper
        Initialize the necessary resource for the incoming playback. For example, prepare the ExoPlayer instance for SimpleExoPlayerView. The initialization is feed by an initial playback info, telling if the playback should start from a specific position or from beginning.

        Normally this info can be obtained from cache if there is cache manager, or PlaybackInfo.SCRAP if there is no such cached information.

        Specified by:
        initialize in class CoolPlayerHelper
        Parameters:
        playbackInfo - the initial playback info.

      • getLatestPlaybackInfo

        @NonNull
public PlaybackInfo getLatestPlaybackInfo()
        Description copied from class: CoolPlayerHelper
        Get latest playback info. Either on-going playback info if current player is playing, or latest playback info available if player is paused.
        Specified by:
        getLatestPlaybackInfo in class CoolPlayerHelper
        Returns:
        latest PlaybackInfo of current Player.
